name: Spaghetti Bolognese
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a pan, sauté chopped onion and garlic until golden.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Pour in tomato sauce and season with oregano, salt, and pepper.
Simmer for 15-20 minutes.
Serve the sauce over cooked spaghetti.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
steps: Grill or cook chicken until fully cooked.
Chop romaine lettuce into bite-sized pieces.
Slice cooked chicken into strips.
Toss lettuce, croutons, chicken, and parmesan cheese together in a bowl.
Drizzle with Caesar dressing and toss until well coated.
Serve immediately.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
steps: Cut tofu into cubes and stir-fry until golden brown.
Add chopped vegetables to the pan and sauté until tender-crisp.
Mix soy sauce, sesame oil, minced ginger, and garlic in a bowl.
Pour the sauce over the vegetables and tofu.
Stir-fry for an additional 2-3 minutes.
Serve over rice.

name: Margherita Pizza
steps: Preheat the oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface.
Spread tomato sauce over the dough.
Top with slices of fresh mozzarella and sprinkle with salt.
Bake for 12-15 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese is melted.
Remove from the oven, garnish with fresh basil, and drizzle with olive oil.

name: Vegetarian Chili
steps: In a large pot, sauté chopped onions and bell peppers until softened.
Add diced tomatoes, kidney beans, black beans, and corn.
Season with chili powder, cumin, and garlic powder.
Simmer for 20-30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve hot, optionally topped with shredded cheese and a dollop of sour cream.

name: Lemon Garlic Roast Chicken
steps: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
Rinse and pat dry the whole chicken.
Rub the chicken with olive oil, salt, and black pepper.
Stuff the cavity with lemon wedges, garlic cloves, and fresh rosemary.
Roast in the oven for 1.5 to 2 hours or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
Let it rest for 10 minutes before carving.

name: Shrimp and Broccoli Stir Fry
steps: In a wok or skillet, stir-fry shrimp in sesame oil until pink and opaque.
Add chopped broccoli and sauté until tender-crisp.
Mix soy sauce, hoisin sauce, minced ginger, and garlic in a bowl.
Pour the sauce over the shrimp and broccoli, tossing to coat.
Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes until heated through.
Garnish with chopped green onions and serve over rice.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C) and line baking sheets with parchment paper.
In a bowl, cream together softened butter, granulated sugar, and brown sugar.
Beat in eggs one at a time and add vanilla extract.
In a separate bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt.
Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, then fold in chocolate chips.
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto the prepared baking sheets and bake for 10-12 minutes or until golden brown.
